posts.title: Debugging = Detective Work
posts.content: Debugging is like being the detective in a crime movie where you are also the murderer.

posts.title: A Classic Java Joke
posts.content: Why do Java developers wear glasses? Because they don’t see sharp.

posts.content: Frontend: Makes it pretty. Backend: Makes it work. DevOps: Makes it stay up.
